name: Die By Dice
description:
You're a little green gnoblet challenging his own fate. Roll the die to clear the area, spawn enemies, crush enemies, (crush yourself), earn points... and test your luck.

CONTROLS:

Keys / WASD = Move

Shift = Run

Space / LeftMouseClick / R = Reroll the center die. This is your bread and butter, use it to earn points and spawn enemies (determined by what number you roll) and use this to crush enemies, but be wary! 

ATTENTION!

-There is a bug where rolling is limited to one reroll after dying and clicking "Reroll". If you want to play multiple rounds you unfortunately have to quit and restart the game :( . This will be fixed in a future build!
